Package smarttrolleygui

SmartTrolley This package contains all the classes and subpackages used for the GUI

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllShoppingListsScreenController
    AllShoppingListsScreenController Class Description: AllShoppingListsScreenController allows java interaction with AllShoppingListsScreen.fxml
    ControllerGeneral
    ControllerGeneral Class Description: This class will hold methods that are used by multiple controller classes.
    CreateNewListScreenController
    CreateNewListScreenController Class Description: CreateNewListScreenController allows java interaction with CreateNewListScreen.fxml
    FavouritesScreenController
    FavouritesScreenController Class Description: FavouritesScreenController allows java interaction with Favourites.fxml
    HomeScreenController
    HomeScreenController Class Description: HomeScreenController allows java interaction with HomeScreen.fxml
    ListProduct
    ListProduct Class Description: This Class extends product, it is used when the product is in a list.
    Offer
    Product Class Description: Offer stores the offers data: OfferID, productID, Offer price
    OffersScreenController
    OffersScreenController Class Description: OffersScreenController allows java interaction with OffersScreen.fxml
    Product
    Product Class Description: Product stores the product's data including: path to product image, product name, product price
    ProductScreenController
    ProductScreenController Class Description: ProductScreenController allows java interaction with ProductScreen.fxml
    ShoppingListController
    ShoppingListController Class Description: ShoppingListController allows java interaction with ExampleShoppingList.fxml
    SmartTrolleyGUI
    SmartTrolleyGUI Class Description: Main GUI class that launches application window.
    StartScreenController
    StartScreenController Class Description: StartScreenController allows java interaction with StartScreen.fxml
    TestAllShoppingListsScreenController
    SmartTrolley Tests the AllShoppingListsController Screen for functionality
    TestCategoryFiltering
    SmartTrolley Tests the Category Filtering for functionality
    TestCreateList
    SmartTrolley This file tests for list creation Adapted from TestDeleteList.java
    TestDeleteList
    SmartTrolley This file tests for list deletion
    TestGUINavigationForTests
    SmartTrolley This class is to be used by tests ONLY.
    TestProductScreenController
    SmartTrolley This file contains the test case for the product screen ProductScreenController
  • Enum Summary

    Enumerated type for the screen to load
